scenario_text.value: Labramon, are you okay?
I, I’m okay... It’s not as bad...as it looks.
Yowch!
I dunno, it looks pretty bad...
I don’t think this will heal by itself.

We have to hurry and find something to treat
her, Takuma!
Yeah!

We have to hurry up and find something to
treat her!

(I’d better bring that first-aid kit back to
Labramon as soon as I can!)
Hey, we found it, Minoru!

Oh hey, the gang’s all here! Is that a first-
aid kit I see there, Aoi?
Yes, Takuma found it somewhere.
Hold on, Labramon, we’ll fix you right up!

Man, good job tracking that thing down. Where
you find it, anyway?
Up on one of the shelves in the faculty room.
Hey, you two... Something’s not right.
So I’m checking the first-aid kit, and...

With the school all messed up like this,
is the medicine even still good?

That’s the thing. The bandages still look
clean, and the disinfectant seems okay.

It all looks brand new to me... Something
isn’t right, but at least we can use it.
...Okay, how’s this, Labramon?
Wow, this is perfect! Thank you so much, Aoi!

(Labramon’s happily wagging her tail.
She’s basically Aoi’s pet pooch now...)

Did you see anything strange? Like a person?
Well, I guess they’d be with you...

Anything strange? Hmm... How should I put
this...

I didn’t see anyone else in the school...
Not that I searched every nook and cranny.

Speaking of which, the restroom looked a bit
worn out.
NnnnnngaaaAAAH, I just don’t get it!

For a second there, I thought we’d traveled
through time or something...

But we didn’t get in a time machine, and this
first-aid kit looks brand-spanking new!

Only the building itself is weathered to
hell... This makes no sense.

I don’t understand. Hopefully we’ll run into
someone else around here...

...Hey, Takuma. This is like some kinda bad
dream, you know?

Sure, I feel the same way. But we can’t be
sure that it’s a dream until we wake up.

Yeah. Even if it hurts to pinch your cheek,
it might still be a dream...

But then the school’s all messed up, and
we’ve got these strange creatures...

What in the world happened here... Do you
guys know anything, Agumon?

Uhhh I dunno what you mean... It’s always
been like this around here, right?
Always? What are you talking about?!
Ah, but it is as Agumon says.

This area has been this way forever—from the
moment we were all born into this world.

We cannot grasp what you find dubious about
all of this.

(“Forever,” he says? But that’s impossible.
The school looked normal before...)

(Isn’t this the same school building?
If not, then what is this place?)
What is going on...? What...
Please, Aoi! Cheer up!
Um... Sorry, Takuma...
Waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaugh!
Hey! That was Ryo’s voice!
He’s here too?!

I’m pretty sure that came from the second
floor!
Okay, it’s hero time...
Minoru...?

I won’t run away this time. I’m gonna go and
save Ryo!
Good. Then allow me to offer my assistance!
Let’s go, Aoi! I’ll keep you safe!

Thank you, Labramon! But don’t push yourself
too hard, we only just finished treating you.

(I’m a little uneasy with all of these things
up in the air, but let’s save it for later.)

(If I focus on what’s in front of me, I can
keep my mind off of it for a while...)
Let’s go, Takuma!
Yeah!

(There’s a first-aid kit! That was easy, but
of course a nurse’s office would have one.)
